title: Justin Bieber Is Spamming Instagram With Posts About Having Kids With Hailey Baldwin
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Justin Bieber hit up Instagram with multiple posts about his future kids with Hailey Baldwin.

Justin and Hailey just got married for the second time in a giant white wedding packed with celeb guests.

Because one wedding wasn’t sufficient, Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin are fresh off a giant celeb-packed ceremony and reception in South Carolina, where they became Mr. and Mrs. Bieber for round two. And now that they’re newlyweds all over again, it looks like Justin has babies on the brain. Or at the very least he has babies on his Instagram.

Bieber has spent the past day or so low-key spamming everyone’s IG feed with cute photos of babies, making it pretty clear that he wants to have one of his own thanks to comments like “This is something I look forward to :)”

Aside from the above cuteness ^, Bieber posted this kid with the comment, “Hailey with your attitude and my savage behaviour [sic], we are in a world of trouble haha.”

As if that’s not enough cute kid content, Justin’s been posting a slew of throwbacks of himself in elementary school, which I guess could be seen as a pretty good clue as to what his and Hailey’s future child will look like. Behold:

Hailey and Justin haven’t revealed their timeline for having kids (’cause, uh, that’s private), but last April they stirred up all kinds of controversy for pretending Hailey was pregnant in the name of April Fools.

Anyway, until a BB Bieber joins the world, please go follow Justin’s cats on Instagram, or as he calls them, his all-caps CAT FAMILY.
